name: Hollow Halls
description: Hollow Halls is a short indie horror game, focusing on story and atmosphere over combat and action.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: 2,33 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 210 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 322 MB available space Sound Card: Not a potato Additional Notes: OS must be 64-bit version, 32-bit version does not work.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: 3,3 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 560 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 322 MB available space Sound Card: Not a potato Additional Notes: OS must be 64-bit version, 32-bit version does not work.
